reviews.text: We had heard stories about this "steak" hotel so decided to visit on a Friday night. We booked which was good because the place was packed (and we had to park 5 minutes walk away). Reservations were handled well and we got a table where we could see the steaks being cooked. My husband was disappointed with the range of beers on tap and the only wine I liked the sound of was $11/glass (and it wasn't really to my liking when I tasted it). We queued up to order our steaks. The line was quite long but moved fast. It is always great to be able to see the cuts of meat in the window; so to an extent you know what you are getting. All steaks come with choice of sauce, salad and potato and bread roll. Despite the number of steaks being cooked, the meals arrived in reasonable time. My steak was cooked as requested but my husband says his was a little rarer than medium-rare. Perhaps it was the cut we chose (both had rib fillet), but we were disappointed as the steaks were nothig to rave about; especially considering the price we paid. We wouldn't visit again.
reviews.title: slightly disappointed
Magnificent Steaks
reviews.text: Eating in the new eatery created from the ashes of the old bottleshop, we had the chance to enjoy pure meat lovers heaven. While the side salad was enjoyable and the baked spuds great, words couldn't do justice to the taste and texture of our steaks. Two rumps and two rib fillets were cooked to perfection (no mean feat as the requests ranged from well done to medium-rare). The melt in your mouth texture was superb and the flavour of the beef was unbelievable. Without a doubt the best steaks in Brisbane by the proverbial country mile. Cant wait to go back.

reviews.title: great steaks
reviews.text: never had a bad steak a bit basic though with a salad and jacket potato and bread roll "airlinesque" not as good as MOO MOO's

reviews.title: An Aussie Dining experience
reviews.text: This was a first for us - an aussie steak house where you chose your steak at what looked like a butcher's counter then went to wait at your table witha buzzer which lit up and bleeped loudly when your meal was ready.

I have been coming here for longer than I care to remember - I believe it to be the best place in Brisbane to get a great steak cooked to your liking. Varioius cuts are on offer i.e. Rump, Rib Fillet, Eye, T Bone. The Norman is about 5kms from the CBD on the southside. It has a large outdoor dining area and is frequented mainly by locals. All steaks come with salad, baked potato and a bread roll. No fuss good quality food. Being a hotel it also has an extensive range of beers, wine and spirits. The average steak costs about $30.
reviews.title: BEST STEAK IN BRISBANE

reviews.text: I love great steak but am often disappointed that it is over or under cooked but not this time. It was definitely one of the best steaks I've had for a long while. It was very busy and the line to order was long but the service was prompt once we had placed our order.
reviews.title: Great steak, cooked to perfection

reviews.text: Our welcome was rude! The glass of red was from a bottle that had been opened two days ago and not looked after, the beer prices were extreme.
reviews.title: Go to the Creek
Sensational steaks..... very very nice
reviews.text: My rare steak was cold, my freind's medium was not much better.

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.text: Very very nice steaks.... I had the big norman which was the largest available.... was $38 but I felt it was worth it.... huge and delicious. No complaints at all about the restaurant. Would go again.

reviews.title: It's been a while since I had half a decent steak. Very picky with my medium-rare. Always over/under-cooked, but...
reviews.text: One of the best steaks in Brisbane. The Norman is so comfortable & relaxed - our favourite!

reviews.title: Steak with heart
reviews.text: A good steak, chilled beer or a glass of cheeky red and what more would one want. My favourite steak place. And the bonus is the atmosphere.

go elsewhere if you want decent steak, like Fiascos over at the Morrison Hotel. the steak isnt very good, the salad is alright, the sauce lacks flavor, and baked potato definitely has a weird taste, almost a burnt taste from the foil in which it is wrapped.
reviews.title: Had better steak in Brisbane

reviews.text: I had a working lunch with colleagues as we work close by.
reviews.title: Just OK, nothing fabulous

reviews.text: I was impressed by the selection of steaks, but that was about all.
reviews.title: The Best Steak
Just missing the excellent boat
reviews.text: The Hotel was not very busy for lunch that day, but we still waited almost an hour for our meals, which were only cooked medium so certainly should not have taken so long.

My boyfriend and I celebrated our anniversary here and really enjoyed our meal! I got the large rib fillet and he got the rump. We had to wait a bit long, about 30-40 mins, for our steak but the wait was worth it! Medium rare heaven! My boyfriend's "rump" was a bit over medium rare but it was still good. The only problem was the steak got cold easily, I guess since it was so big and I wasn't really in a hurry to finish it. We love the salad and the dressing that comes with the meal, too.
reviews.title: Truly the worst vegetarian restaurant!

reviews.text: Since it was our first time there, we had to ask a lot of questions (like who do we talk to to get a seat? where to order beverages/drinks?) - sadly, I really didn't enjoy talking to the staff because they weren't really friendly, not smiling and they were too abrupt. It wasn't that busy when we arrived but the way the staff were acting was very stiff. Good thing the girl taking orders/cashier - Alaine, I think was her name - was very nice and accommodating.
reviews.title: Steak to die for!

reviews.text: We took a cab from Queens St. going to Normans and it costs about 13AUD. On the way back to Queens St. I think we paid around 20AUD. They have a phone inside the restaurant so you can call a cab when you're ready to go, just ask :)
reviews.title: Great steak & better than average selection of beers on tap
Great
reviews.text: Mainly courtyard seating with a nice relaxed atmosphere. There is table service for drinks, but meals have to be ordered from the counter and picked up when your buzzer rings.
The food is fantastic! Large sized meals with everything on the plate tasting superb including the dinner rolls. I would definitely return for the steak!
reviews.title: Awesome Steak
